data.text: @HuffPostUK Meghan is going to be looked after better than most residents of the UK. Look how they treat their disabled,elderly, poor, aged, in need of hospitals. If she plays the part, keeps her head down & plays the part, she nor her children will never want for anything, ever again.
@HuffPostUK Stand on the right, walk up the left.
@HuffPostUK Knowing not to put custard on black pudding 🤭

@HuffPostUK PS ..... #Land  will always B a winner (from either end of #spectrum) ..... This forms the background to #BibleStory.   If only ppl knew abt #Symbolism, eh?  Well, that's wot the #Crypt in the #Manger is all about.   Mmmm. #YumYumYum.

@HuffPostUK .... Errrrr.   Sorry, wot an ignoramus I must be, 4getting there's a layer of society that duzn't even think about #Money, cos it's totally irrelevant, as are all matters of #health.   
#SkiSkiSki holidays.  #CharityPR   #CharityCharityCharity   #Prisms

@HuffPostUK Ensure u invest all £ in #Land & #Buildings - ie. #Property cos e/one has primary need 4 #shelter.  Invest in Pharming #Pharma: a nobrainer winner cos humans remain totally oblivious 2 their #Sovereign, #Royal & #Supernatural status - thru #intuition 'n experiential living....
@HuffPostUK Maybe leave London for a bit.  A whole different world awaits.....

@HuffPostUK Live in the North, people are lovely and if you are going to have dogs or knock about with people with dogs then ditch that white coat and buy something dark coloured and machine washable!
@HuffPostUK Dont. Stay in USA
@HuffPostUK The post office is nothing like the post office back home. They are grim and slow but replace the queues (lines) of the DMV
@HuffPostUK Move to the EU
@HuffPostUK British are not all stiff upper lip get used to cockney
@HuffPostUK Make sure ur immigration status is settled
@HuffPostUK Learn to appreciate a "nice cup of tea"
@HuffPostUK  https://t.co/VSWoO6HNxr
@HuffPostUK Start every sentence with “In America we......” And make sure you state whatever it is, it’s better in the US. Brits love direct criticism. They thrive on it. Best of luck.
@Ester_Santos87 @HuffPostUK Wanna send us a short video, filmed on your phone, going into these things a bit more? 😂 we'd love to include your views in a video. DM us if you need more info
@HuffPostUK Make sure your immigration papers are in order or you'll have farage, ukip and the brexiteers on your back
@HuffPostUK Bit hard for me to give advice. I visited the UK a couple of years ago, walked around London & nobody noticed.
@Ester_Santos87 @HuffPostUK Everything's dry, the food, the people, the humour, everything except the weather
@HuffPostUK Don't wear that white coat anywhere near Trafalgar Square.
@HuffPostUK Set up home elsewhere, or at least make sure you have somewhere to go
@HuffPostUK Why not visit the cute village of Tower Hamlets?
@HuffPostUK Be careful just to sift through for the negatives, won’t you. Especially all those swivel eyed racists who voted Brexit huh?
@HuffPostUK Sausages
